name: Social Security Soldier Anti Virus Venture
name_original: Social Security Soldier Anti Virus Venture
description: The Social Security Soldier Anti Virus Venture (SSSAVV) is a mobile game designed to facilitate education on cyber wellness for children. Players play as an anti-virus (Security Software Soldier) and is given the task to explore the maze infiltrated by harmful viruses like Malware. Players will need to defeat and block these viruses that they encounter in the maze to prevent it from harming any of the accounts in the computer they're installed.
